item.title: Atharva About
item.dc:creator: kishor
item.content:encoded:
WHO ARE WE

We are a team of highly dynamic engineers and software developers.

We are a team of highly dynamic engineers and software developers who have honed their skills in diverse disciplines. We provide high quality innovative solutions tailored to the unique needs of our clients. We are confident in our ability to customize our solutions to match up to your requirements empowering you to achieve your goals and more. In our 3 years as an up and coming software start we have delivered AI solutions and web solutions with state of the art technology. What we truly take pride in is our robustness to learn, implement and adapt to new technology while also providing easy to use solutions.

Give Quality software solutions

Empower you to achieve more

3 years of experience in software
industry

Give value using the latest and future
technology

Our Team

Shovan Raj Shrestha

Software Engineer

Swain Shrestha

Software Engineer

Sushil Khadka

Software Engineer

Sajan Amatya

Software Engineer

item.title: Cloud Services
item.dc:creator: atharva
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Services

Our team at Atharva has an extensive knowledge and experience in managing cloud based services such as Digital Ocean services, Google Cloud Services and AWS services providing you with efficient handling of your cloud infrastructure.

Services we provide

Digital Ocean

AWS

Google Cloud

CI/CD

Our Experties

DevOps

Our DevOps team together with ITOps and QA can provide Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipeline to provide the best possible automation in the software development cycle ensuring smooth operations of the cloud based services.

Heading for how we develop web application

Node JS is not a programming language, but it allows developers to use JavaScript, which is
a programming language that allows users to build web applications. This tool is
mostly used by programmers who use JavaScript to write Server-Side scripts.

Work with latest tech

Node JS is not a programming language, but it allows developers to use JavaScript, which is a programming language that allows users to build web applications. This tool is mostly used by programmers who use JavaScript to write Server-Side scripts.

Achieve business goal

Save time

Ready to Digital Transformation?

We provide best team and service.

Mobile Apps Development

Enhancing your business capability with
custom web applications designed
with your goals in mind.

Services we provide

Flutter

IOS

Android

React Native

Heading for how we develop web application

Node JS is not a programming language, but it allows developers to use JavaScript, which is
a programming language that allows users to build web applications. This tool is
mostly used by programmers who use JavaScript to write Server-Side scripts.

item.title: Custom Drone Manufacture
item.dc:creator: atharva
item.content:encoded:
Custom Drone Manufacturing

Our engineering and design office helps you from the design to the
manufacturing of your UAV solution. 

" Technology must adapt to needs.
That is all. "

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattisOur engineering and design office helps you from the design to the manufacturing of your UAV solution. , pulvinar dapibus leo.

Our design and enginnering office offers
companies ready-to-use solutions through
various services:

  • 1. POC (proof of concept)
  • 2. Prototyping, testing and validation
  • 3. Cretification, industrialization and manufacturing
  • 4. Maintenance, support and training
  • 4. Maintenance, support and training

Beyond a UAS is a whole process of support to our customers. We will understand your needs help you validate the value brought by the UAV, test and validate the prototypes in real environments with your teams, industrialize, manufacture, help you build the right business models and the associated services (training, installation, after sales)

TAILOR-MADE DRONES TO IMPROVE BUSINESS PROCESSES

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

TAILOR-MADE UAVS TO OFFER INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS ON THE MARKET

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.
